findings.title: liquidatePosition() function is internal and unused
findings.description: The liquidatePosition() function is declared as internal but it's not being used anywhere in the contract.

findings.title: setProtectedTokens() function is internal and unused
findings.description: The setProtectedTokens() function is declared as internal but it's not being used anywhere in the contract.

findings.title: Governance address can enable/disable forceMigrate
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to enable or disable the forceMigrate function.

findings.title: Management address can change minAutoToSell
findings.description: The management address has the privilege to modify the minAutoToSell variable, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Management address can change path
findings.description: The management address has the privilege to modify the path, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Governance address can change treasury address
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify the treasury address, which could lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Governance and Guardian addresses can change treasury address
findings.description: The Governance and Guardian addresses have the privilege to modify the treasury address.

findings.title: Governance address can change management address
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify the management address.

findings.title: Governance address can change Governance address
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify its own address.

findings.title: Governance address can change depositLimit
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify the deposit limit.

findings.title: Governance address can change performance and management fees
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify performance and management fees, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Governance and Guardian addresses can enable/disable emergencyShutdown
findings.description: The Governance and Guardian addresses have the capability to enable or disable the emergency shutdown functionality.

findings.title: Governance address can add/remove strategy
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to add or remove strategies without any restrictions.

findings.title: Governance and Guardian addresses can revoke strategies
findings.description: The Governance and Guardian addresses have the privilege to revoke strategies.

findings.title: Authorized address can change strategist and keeper addresses
findings.description: The authorized address has the privilege to modify strategist and keeper addresses, which may lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of the contract's logic.

findings.title: Strategist address can change rewards address
findings.description: The strategist address has the privilege to modify the rewards address, which may lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Authorized address can allow emergency exit
findings.description: The authorized address has the capability to enable an emergency exit, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized address can change profitFactor, debtThreshold and maxReportDelay
findings.description: The authorized address has the privilege to modify critical parameters such as profitFactor, debtThreshold, and maxReportDelay, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Governance address can withdraw ERC20 tokens
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to withdraw ERC20 tokens.

findings.title: Governance and Strategist addresses can enable/disable flashLoanActive
findings.description: The Governance and Strategist addresses have the capability to enable or disable the flashLoanActive feature.

findings.title: Governance and Strategist addresses can change minXvsToSell and minWant values
findings.description: The Governance and Strategist addresses have the privilege to modify minXvsToSell and minWant values, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Governance and Strategist addresses can change collateralTarget
findings.description: The Governance and Strategist addresses have the ability to modify the collateral target, which could lead to potential security risks.
